industrial_initiative.name: Industrial Initiative
industrial_initiative.description: Gain 1 trade good for each industrial planet you control.

plague.name: Plague
plague.description: Roll 1 die for each infantry on a planet controlled by another player. For each result of 6 or greater, destroy that unit.

reactor_meltdown.name: Reactor Meltdown
reactor_meltdown.description: Destory 1 space dock in a non-home system.

lucky_shot.name: Lucky Shot
lucky_shot.description: Destroy 1 dreadnought, cruiser, or destroyer in a system that contains a planet you control.

uprising.name: Uprising
uprising.description: Exhaust 1 non-home planet controlled by another player and gain trade goods equal to its resource value.

cripple_defenses.name: Criple Defences
cripple_defenses.description: Choose 1 planet and destroy each PDS.

focused_research.name: Focused Research
focused_research.description: Spend 4 trade goods to research 1 technology

unexpected_action.name: Unexpected Action
unexpected_action.description: Remove 1 of your command tokens from game board and return to your reinforcements.

tactical_bombardment.name: Tactical Bombardment
tactical_bombardment.description: Exhaust each planet controlled by another player in a system that contains one of your units that has bombardment in that same system.

signal_jamming.name: Signal Jamming
signal_jamming.description: Place a command token from another player's reinforcements on a non-home system that contains or is adjacent to 1 of your ships.

ghost_ship.name: Ghost Ship
ghost_ship.description: Place 1 destroyer from your reinforcements in a non-home system that contains a wormhole and does not contain other players' ships.

spy.name: Spy
spy.description: Choose 1 player to give you 1 random action card from their hand.

war_effort.name: War Effort
war_effort.description: Place 1 cruiser from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships

frontline_deployment.name: Frontline Deployment
frontline_deployment.description: Place 3 infantry from your reinforecements on 1 planet you control

unstable_planet.name: Unstable Planet
unstable_planet.description: Choose 1 hazardous planet to exhaust and destroy up to 3 infantry on it.

mining_initiative.name: Mining Initiative
mining_initiative.description: Gain trade goods equal to the resource value of 1 planet you control.

rise_of_a_messiah.name: Rise of a Messiah
rise_of_a_messiah.description: Place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on a planet you control.

insubordination.name: Insubordination
insubordination.description: Remove 1 player's token from their tactic pool and return it to their reinforcements.

economic_initiative.name: Economic Initiative
economic_initiative.description: Ready each cultural planet you control.

x-89_bacterial_weapon.name: X-89 Bacterial Weapon
x-89_bacterial_weapon.description: Choose 1 planet that contains 1 or more of your ships that has bombardment. Destroy all infantry on that planet and exhaust this card.
